ingredient.li: 2 cans (10-3/4 ounces each) condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted
2 cans (10-3/4 ounces each) condensed cream of mushroom soup, undiluted

recipetext.li: In a large bowl, beat eggs and milk. Add bread; mix gently and let stand for 5 minutes. Add beef, onion, baking powder, salt and papper; mix well (mixture will be soft). Shape into 1-in. balls.

In a large skillet, brown meatballs, a few at a time, in shortening. Place in an ungreased 3-qt. baking dish. In a bowl, stir soups and milk until smooth, pour over meatballs. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 1 hour. Sprinkle with parsley. Yield: 8-10 servings.
